intro.speaker: Lissa
intro.line: Here we are! The Shepherds' garrison. Go on, Make yourself at home.

intro.speaker: Maribelle
intro.line: Lissa, my treasure! Are you all right? I've been on pins and needles!

intro.speaker: Lissa
intro.line: Oh, hey, Maribelle!

intro.speaker: Maribelle
intro.line: "Oh hey" yourself! I've sprouted 14 grey hairs fretting over you!

intro.speaker: Lissa
intro.line: Aw, you worry too much. I can handle a battle or two! ...Although I could do without the bugs and the bear barbecue...

intro.speaker: Vaike
intro.line: Hey, squirt! Where's Chrom? I bet he had a rough time out there without ol' Teach and his trusty axe!

intro.speaker: Lissa
intro.line: Oh, so you're "Teach" now, Vaike, is that it? Hee hee! And here I thought people were just born lacking wits. It can be taught?

intro.speaker: Vaike
intro.line: Ha! Never doubt the Vaike! ...Wait, was that an insult?

intro.speaker: Sumia
intro.line: Beg pardon, but when might we see the captian?

intro.speaker: Maribelle
intro.line: Poor Sumia. She's simply been beside herself with concern... Her eyes were scanning the horizon all day during training. ...She might have earned fewer bruises fighting blindfolded.

intro.speaker: Lissa
intro.line: Aw, Sumia, that's so sweet of you to worry about Chrom.

intro.speaker: Sumia
intro.line: Worry? Well, I... He's our captain and our prince- of course I'd worry!

intro.speaker: Vaike
intro.line: So, who's the stranger?

intro.speaker: Lissa
intro.line: No one's stranger than you Vaike... But allow me to introduce Robin! He/She just joined the Shepherds. Chrom's made him/her our new tactician. You should see all the tricks he/she's got up his/her sleeve!

intro.speaker: Vaike
intro.line: Oh yeah? Can he/she do this? *buuuuuurp*

intro.speaker: Robin
intro.line: I'm sure I have much to learn in the belching arts, "Teach." In any case, it's a pleasure to make your acquaintances.

intro.speaker: Maribelle
intro.line: Ugh, Vaike! That was abhorrent! Must you baseborn oafs pollute even the air with your buffoonery? And you, Robin! Don't encourage him! I'd hope you were cut from finer cloth. Hmph!

intro.speaker: Sumia
intro.line: Don't take it to heart, Robin. Maribelle warms to people slowly.

intro.speaker: Lissa
intro.line: Or burns too quickly! Hee hee! But yeah, just give her time.

intro.speaker: Sumia
intro.line: Ah! Captain! You've returned! I was- I mean, we were so-

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: Sumia! Are you all right? ...Those boots of yours again?

intro.speaker: Sumia
intro.line: No! I mean, yes! I mean... *sigh*

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: All right, listen, everyone: in the morning, we'll be marching to Regna Ferox.

intro.speaker: Robin
intro.line: Regna Ferox?

intro.speaker: Sumia
intro.line: A unified kingdom to Ylisse's north inhabitied by barbarians, or so it's said.

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: Warriors are what they are, and we'll need their strength to quell thas new menace. Typically, the exalt would request such aid in person. But given recent events... Well, the people might worry should my sister suddenly leave the capital. So the task has been passed to us. Now, this mission is strictly voluntary. So if, for any-

intro.speaker: Lissa
intro.line: I volunteer!

intro.speaker: Vaike
intro.line: Me too! You'll be needin' ol' Teach along for such a delicate mission!

intro.speaker: Kellam
intro.line: I'll go as well. ...What? I've been here the whole time!

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: Yes, Sumia?

intro.speaker: Sumia
intro.line: It's just that... I'm not sure I'm quite ready for a proper mission just yet. I'd probably just get in the way.

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: Well, you could stay behind the main group, and if a battle is met, just watch and learn? Your choice, of course. But some lessons can only be learned on the battlefield.

intro.speaker: Sumia
intro.line: W-well, if you think it wise, Captain.

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: Just stay by me and you'll be fine.

intro.speaker: Sumia
intro.line: Oh, yes! I mean- Yes, sir, I'll do that!

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: Is everyone ready? We've a long march ahead.

intro.speaker: Stahl
intro.line: W-wait for me!

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: Stahl?

intro.speaker: Stahl
intro.line: Why am I the last to hear about this expedition to Ferox?

intro.speaker: Lissa
intro.line: Huh? Vaike was supposed to... Vaike! Did you forget to tell Stahl about our mission?

intro.speaker: Vaike
intro.line: The Vaike never forgets! ...I just don't always remember, is all...

intro.speaker: Lissa
intro.line: Ugh... I swear, you'd forget your own name if you weren't constantly saying it yourself! Speaking of which, are you SURE you remembered your axe this time?

intro.speaker: Vaike
intro.line: Hey! That was one time! ...Okay, twice, but training sessions don't count. Anyway, I got it right here. Teach is loaded and ready for action! Glad to have you along, Stahl, ol' buddy.

intro.speaker: Stahl
intro.line: That makes one of us. I was in such a hurry, I had to miss breakfast! There were muffins, and cakes, and... Well, I can tell you all about it while we march...

intro.speaker: Robin
intro.line: Your name is Stahl, right?

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: Oh, I'm sorry, Robin. This is Stahl, one of our finest.

intro.speaker: Stahl
intro.line: Hello, Robin. Miriel told me we had a new Shepherd. Er, Miriel's one of our mages. She should catch up soon.

battle.speaker: Chrom
battle.line: Gods, have the Risen spread this far?

battle.speaker: Frederick
battle.line: We needed a name for this new threat, so the council gave them one.

battle.speaker: Chrom
battle.line: Everyone, remember what we're up against!

battle.speaker: Vaike
battle.line: Mya ha! They'll remember ME once I drive my axe into their... Wait... My axe. Where's my axe?! I had it a second ago!

battle.speaker: Chrom
battle.line: Vaike, this is no time for jokes...

battle.speaker: Vaike
battle.line: I'm serious! It's gone, but I JUST had it! It's got to be around here somewhere...

battle.speaker: Chrom
battle.line: Keep to the rear, then! The battle is nigh!

battle.speaker: Frederick
battle.line: All right, listen up. ...Especially those of you who BROUGHT weapons! All weapons have strengths and weaknesses to bear in mind. Lances have an advantage over swords, for example, while swords best axes. We'll want to work this into our strategy whenever possible.

battle.speaker: Miriel
battle.line: Splendid! It seems I've caught up. Now to extirpate these brutes... Hmm? Is that an axe? Why yes it is... Perhaps someone mislaid it? I'd not thought such dereliction permissible amoung the Shepherds. Still, I'd be remiss to not return this implement to its owner. Perhaps along with a stern word or two of disapprobation!

battle-talk.speaker: Miriel
battle-talk.line: I wondered what manner of ignoramus would mislay their weapon. Now I know.

battle-talk.speaker: Vaike
battle-talk.line: Thanks, Miriel! ...Er, for the axe anyway!

battle-talk.speaker: Miriel
battle-talk.line: Perhaps next time I'll use a spell to fasten it to your hands... permanently.

battle-talk.speaker: Chrom
battle-talk.line: What's next, Robin? Guide our swords.

battle-talk.speaker: Frederick
battle-talk.line: Might I advise patience, milord? Robin is a fine tactician, but we have been working her/him mercilessly. Even the best of us needs rest.

battle-talk.speaker: Frederick
battle-talk.line: Perhaps Robin would prefer we choose our own actions at times.

battle-talk.speaker: Frederick
battle-talk.line: We could use a simple command that lets us fight on our own. So long as Robin realizes such a strategy does not guarantee victory. Acting as we see fit may not always lead us to the best course of action.

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: Finally, and good riddance! But if they're appearing this far up the Northroad...

end.speaker: Frederick
end.line: Then no path is safe. We'll need to stay wary.

end.speaker: Robin
end.line: Well, what do we have here?

end.speaker: Lissa
end.line: Hey, is that what I think it is?

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: It's a pegasus, all right. I think it's hurt. Let's just have a look here...

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: WHOA! Down, girl! Easy there!

end.speaker: Sumia
end.line: Captain, one moment!

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: Sumia! Are you all right? ...Those boots of yours again?

end.speaker: Sumia
end.line: No! I mean, Yes! I mean... *sigh*

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: Well, come no closer. This beast is crazed!

end.speaker: Sumia
end.line: It's okay, Captain. I can handle this... Shhh... Easy now, girl. I won't hurt you.

end.speaker: Sumia
end.line: Shhh...

end.speaker: Robin
end.line: How did she calm it so quickly?

end.speaker: Lissa
end.line: That's incredible, Sumia!

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: I've never seen anything like it.

end.speaker: Sumia
end.line: Oh, it's...it's nothing. Really. I just have a way with animals, I guess.

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: I should say so!

end.speaker: Sumia
end.line: You all go ahead. I'll dress her wounds and catch up as soon as we're able.

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: We can make time to wait for you.

end.speaker: Sumia
end.line: thank you, Captain. But I can manage. Every moment is precious when all of Ylisse is in danger.

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: Right, then. Be safe, Sumia.

end.speaker: Sumia
end.line: As you command, sir.
